import re

def words_string(s, target):
    words_list = re.findall('', s.replace(',', ' '))
    result = [word[::-1] for word in words_list if word != target]
    return result

import re

def words_string(s, target):
    words_list = re.findall("[\\w']+", s.replace('', ' '))
    result = [word[::-1] for word in words_list if word != target]
    return result

import re

def words_string(s, target):
    words_list = re.findall("[\\w']+", s.replace(',', ' '))
    result = [word[::--1] for word in words_list if word != target]
